name: EVERY (few) WORDS are RANDOM!
description:
First off, yes this game is 100% random

Third, What does 2 + 2 equal? 

Second, I know that this website looks gross, it is my aesthetic. (made all by myself so fight me)

This game is made for the 2022 GMTK GameJam  Theme: Roll of the Dice. Enjoy!
